Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2008 03:15AM jan3277 wrote: HI,  I HAD A MASTECTOMY ON JAN. 4, 2008.  I AM NOT GONIG TO LIE TO YOU, IT WAS THE WORST EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE.  NEXT TO BEING DX WITH BREAST CANCER.  I HAD MY MASTECTOMY IN JANUARY, STARTED CHEMO IN FEB.  I HAD 4 TREATMENTS 3 WEEKS APART.  THEN I GOT THE EXPANDER IN APRIL, THE BEST THING I EVER DID. I STARTED BACK TO WORK MID-MAY.  I GOT THE EXPANDER OUT AND THE IMPLANT IN AT THE END OF SUMMER.  I AM GETTING THE LAST STAGE JANUARY 13,2009, THE NIPPLE.  AND I CAN'T WAIT.  I THINK IT WILL REALLY HELP ME MENTALLY.  AND MAKE ME FULL HOLE AGAIN.  IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS FEEL FREE TO ASK.  EVERYONE IS TELLING YOU THEY UNDERSTAND, BUT UNTIL THEY HAVE BEEN THROUGH ALL THE STEPS, THEY DON'T.
Posts.Title: January Mastectomy crusader1 bettelou68

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2008 03:42AM jan3277 wrote: JUST WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW THAT I THINK THE MX WAS 10 TIMES WORSE THAN THE RECON.  IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO CHAT ABOUT IT SOME MORE I WOULD BE HAPPY TO TELL YOU ANYTHING YOU WANT TO KNOW.  AND YOU DO NOT HAVE TO DO IT AT THE SAME TIME AS YOUR MX.  THE RECON WAS SOMETHING THAT HELPED ME GET THROUGH THIS YEAR.  AND I AM NOT THE TYPE OF PERSON WHO IS ALL ABOUT THE WAY THEY LOOK.  I WAS ABOUT THE WAY I FELT. AND IT MAY HAVE BEEN BECAUSE I WAS 29.  I DO NOT KNOW HOW OLD YOU ARE, BUT I DON'T THINK AGE MATTERS, YOU DO.
Posts.Title: January Mastectomy crusader1 bettelou68
